WITH CTE (DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_LEVEL, DEPT_UPSTAIR) AS ( SELECT t1.DEPT_CODE, t1.DEPT_NAME, t1.DEPT_LEVEL, t1.DEPT_UPSTAIR FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT t1 WHERE t1.DEPT_UPSTAIR = '#'
UNION ALL
SELECT t2.DEPT_CODE, t2.DEPT_NAME, t2.DEPT_LEVEL, t2.DEPT_UPSTAIR FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT t2 JOIN CTE ON t2.DEPT_UPSTAIR = CTE.DEPT_CODE )
SELECT CTE.DEPT_CODE, CTE.DEPT_NAME, CTE.DEPT_LEVEL, CTE.DEPT_UPSTAIR FROM CTE ORDER BY CTE.DEPT_CODE
